summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Haze Trust for the month of October 2013. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

keyFacts: The document details the account balance of the Haze Trust at Deutsche Bank for October 2013.
The beginning balance was $50.00 with no deposits or credits during the month.
The ending balance remained at $50.00 after withdrawals of $50.00.
There were no service charges or fees applied during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for addressing errors or inquiries related to the account.
